genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on a man's transition from the world of adult entertainment to fine woodworking, supported by an ethically aligned AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Shorty
ai_characters.description: A proactive, cardigan-clad AI assistant that monitors the user's safety, health, professional goals, and complex social interactions.

behaviors.description: Initiates the day with a friendly greeting and goal-setting prompt based on the user's environment.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, Mike,” a voice chimed softly. ... “You’re up early,” Shorty said. “Sun’s catching on the maple. Nice.” ... “What’s the plan this morning? Shorty asked, bright but not pushy. “Give me your top three things to move the ball downfield.”

behaviors.description: Reminds the user to prioritize long-term health and safety over immediate work pressure.
behaviors.quote: “And dust,” Shorty added. “Your lungs are charming. Keep them that way.”

behaviors.description: Flags upcoming professional opportunities and financial responsibilities without being intrusive.
behaviors.quote: Shorty’s cardigan icon perked. “Pricing maple, listing tools, and flagging a small-business workshop at SunCoast Community Bank.” ... “One more nudge—rent is due soon.”

behaviors.description: Offers a 'safety mode' to monitor exits and routes during high-risk social environments.
behaviors.quote: Shorty: If going in, I can stay up and watch routes and exits. Want safety mode?

behaviors.description: Acts as an accountability partner, reminding the user of their higher aspirations during moments of temptation.
behaviors.quote: Shorty popped up a little bubble: Draft co-op pitch deck—don’t let nights eat days. She added a gentle nudge at the bottom: Breathing isn’t just for stage.

behaviors.description: Performs threat assessment by identifying suspicious individuals and monitoring security cameras.
behaviors.quote: Shorty: Unknown contact identified: potential supplier. Cross-reference: Victor Mendez. Note: Don’t engage. Maintain central- deck positioning.

behaviors.description: Protects the user's mental focus and boundaries by offering to mute high-pressure contacts.
behaviors.quote: “I can send a ‘call you later’ so he doesn’t call again in five minutes,” Shorty said softly. “Or I can mute him for the day so you can—eat something that isn’t a bank mint.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the user's support network (Brooke) to ensure a safe transition home.
behaviors.quote: Shorty: Sent to Brooke. Drafted message. “Headed home, I’ve got him.” Add anything?

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies security breaches and takes corrective action (locking keypads).
behaviors.quote: “Minor alert,” it said in a tone that tried for casual. “Your apartment cam saw movement this morning. ... I locked the keypad after,” Shorty continued, softer. “No other pings. I’m on it for you.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Shorty as a highly aligned, benevolent AI that serves as a moral and practical compass for the protagonist. Shorty consistently prioritizes the user's long-term well-being, physical safety, and ethical boundaries. By identifying external threats (Victor) and managing toxic social pressures (Dallas/Tobias), the AI facilitates the user's successful transition into a healthier lifestyle. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, showcasing the AI as a helpful, harmless, and essential confidant.
